INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the plasma concentrations and of the effectiveness of the corticoids due to increase of their hepatic metabolism by the inducer: the consequences are particularly great in patients with Addison’s disease treated with the hydrocortisone and in the case of transplants.
